meanings.definition: A person who cooks food on a barbecue.
meanings.sent1: The barbecuers grilled delicious burgers at the picnic.
meanings.sent2: The barbecuers gathered around the grill to cook steaks.
meanings.sent3: The barbecuers joked about having a barbecue in the snow.
meanings.sent4: The barbecuers were like culinary artists painting flavors on the grill.
meanings.sent5: The barbecuers' passion for grilling was evident in every dish they cooked.

meanings.sent1: We invited the barbecuers to our backyard party.
meanings.sent2: The group of barbecuers brought their own special sauces.
meanings.sent3: The barbecuers formed a line to get their barbecue plates.
meanings.sent4: The backyard was filled with the laughter of the barbecuers.
meanings.sent5: The barbecuers' camaraderie made the barbecue even more enjoyable.
